resources.string:
In this app you can see which other travelers are interested in similar trips to yours.
 you can connect with them, correspond with them and manage your travel together!
 
 In this app, we will not allow the use of improper language and selling travel items.
 
 Please note that the minimum age to use the app is 18.
 
 The use of this app is on your own responsibility.
